properties.name: cloudself.site.prod-site
properties.description: prod网址，用于cors, 可以包含*

properties.name: cloudself.site.only-https
properties.description: 启用该选项会更安全，但会停止对http请求的支持

properties.name: cloudself.auth.required-by-default
properties.description: 默认是否对所有api验证登陆信息

properties.name: cloudself.auth.exclude-patterns
properties.description: 无需认证的地址, 与@LoginRequired(false)作用相同

properties.name: cloudself.auth.token-expire-time-seconds
properties.description: 登陆Token的过期时间，默认12小时

properties.name: cloudself.auth.remember-me-days
properties.description: 登陆时，最多记住我多少天，默认-1表示永远
